General.Name: Interpharm Holdings Inc
General.Description: Interpharm Holdings, Inc. develops, manufactures, and markets generic prescription strength and over-the-counter pharmaceuticals. The company supplies its medicines to major retailers, wholesalers, managed care organizations, and national distributors. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Hauppauge, New York.
General.Address: 75 Adams Avenue, Hauppauge, NY, United States, 11788
